choices: gets to the Mess hall with no problem
1.content:
(If you don't know about Beast wars and the characters, then go here,http://www.wreckandrule.co.uk and then click Beast wars Character information)

Waspinator awoke from his sleep as his alarm went off. The robot wasp then groggily got and left for the mess room of the Predacon base.

on the way, Waspinator encontered
1.title: the begging of a strange day

12.content:
On the way Waspinator walked past Rampage, the mass murderer of the Predacons, walking the other way. It was then Waspinator noticed the peace sign Rampage was carrying and on the sign where the words STOP THE WAR.

Waspinator stared at the sign. It was then Waspinator saw...
12.title: Rampage wanting peace

choices: They're called to Megatron's throne room
121.content:
Terrorsaur then came down the hallway with a look of confusing.

"Waspinator, what's happing?"

"Terror-Bot?" Waspinator said in his usual habit of talking in third person (That means he doesn't use you or me) "But Terror-bot died"

"I don't know. One minute, I was falling in to the lava pit, the next thing I know I'm here. What's going on"

Before Waspinator could answer
121.title: back from the dead

choices: tell the truth ,that they have no idea
1211.content:
"Waspinator!!" Megatron's voice bellowed.

Waspinator and Terrorsaur began to run towards the throne room, where they saw the strangest sight.


Megatron had been turned into four smaller versions of himself.

"Oompa Loompa, Preda Gee! What in the pit has happened to me?

Why is Terrorsaur still alive?

I want to know in five?" the Megatrons sang.

Waspinator and Terrorsuar...
1211.title: Oompa Megatron

13.content:
His door sliding open, Waspinator started for the mess hall. Still half-asleep, he passed by Inferno's open door. Glancing in, he saw Inferno dancing to disco, the traditional point dance. Continuing, Waspinator was at the mess hall doors when realization hit him like an energy blast.
"Waaaaaiiiiiiit a minute..." Waspinator pondered."Bug-bot HATEZ disco..." Back-tracking, Waspinator...
13.title: Inferno disco dancing

choices: run screaming back to your quarters
14.content: The flying fish flaps up and smiles. It is a pretty sparkly blue color, with pink wings. "Hi!" It says in a high-pitched yet soft voice. My name's Nemo. Can you help me find my dad?
14.title: flying fishy

142.content:
"Waspinator must have loose optic circuit, after last time getting blown to scrap." The predacon commented dejectedly at the sight of what was clearly a hallucination. Knocking himself on the side of the head a few times until it was gone, he continued on his way.

Though when he arrived the fact that _____ was there, chatting amicably with Dinobot II certainly threw the poor Bugbot's processor for a loop.
142.title: decline and walk on

info.brief_description: Waspinator finds himself in a weird adventure where anything could happen.
info.description:
Waspinator wakes up one day to find that strange things happing all around, and if that wasn't bad enough it's about to get worse as it get weirder.

No sex scenes,gay/lasbian, or chacter death allowed.
